River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. There are some breathtaking battle scenes and the Wanganui scenery is beautiful, well suited to Universal’s Technicolor. The supporting performances are outstanding, but the lead is miscast and the complicated plot could have been explained a little more to the American public.

The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. Unfortunately the search party gets caught under the spikes and kidnaps one of their crew.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film.
